dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, focusing on micromanagement tasks in the StarCraft II game, where teams of agents compete against each other.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: An environment designed to assess the credit assignment problem in multi-agent settings, where agents receive rewards based on their actions affecting the overall team performance.
dcterms:title: Checkers Environment

dcterms:description: A suite of environments for multi-agent reinforcement learning that includes various tasks where agents must learn to cooperate and compete.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle Environment (MPE)
